Sublist

Description

Determining if a list is a sublist of another list.

Synopsis

  • data Sublist
    • = Equal
    • | Sublist
    • | Superlist
    • | Unequal
  • sublist :: Eq a => [a] -> [a] -> Sublist

Documentation

data Sublist

Result of comparing two lists to determine if the first is a sublist of the second.

Constructors

Equal

The two lists are equal.

Sublist

The first list is a fully contained, in order, in the second list.

Superlist

The first list fully contains, in order, the second list.

Unequal

Neither list fully contains the other.

Instances

Eq Sublist 
Show Sublist 

sublist :: Eq a => [a] -> [a] -> Sublist

Given two lists, returns a Sublist based on the first list compared to the second.
